channel.title: Netty on NZ's Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Netty on NZ's Digital Garden

item.title: Netty
item.description: Boss Group vs Worker Group Boss Group 负责处理连接，Worker Group 负责处理实际的 IO 读写。 Channel, ChannelEvent, ChannelHandler, ChannelPipeline Upstream vs Downstream Upstream 表示 inbound，即读操作。 Downstream 表示 outbound，即写操
